name: Happy Holidays Fighting Game
description:
A re-release with new music and updated movesets. Use special shields that can be broken, and special moves such as Easter Bunny's upside-down-switching magic, or the Witch's mask-swapping move -- each with their own unique effects. Controls are extremely simple, with no combos required.

Desktop

Minimum Requirements

        Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
        OS: Windows 8.1
        Processor: Intel Celeron CPU 1007U @ 1.5 GHz
        Memory: 100 MB RAM
        Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
        DirectX: Version 11
        Storage: 30 MB available space
        Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio

Android

Android Version 4.4 (minimum)

50 MB storage space
